title: Game Scoop Episode 634
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Tom Marks, and Michael Swaim -- are discussing the Steam Deck and a controversial issue of Die Hard Game Fan. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions. The music in this episode is from Metroid on the NES.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
